text: The second BLAST analysis yields the percentage of sequence space occupied by each fragment in the original sample (number of reads comprising a fragment, divided by the total number of reads in the input sample library) and the enriched sample (number of sequences in the enriched sample matching to a specific fragment, divided by the total number of reads in the enriched sample library). The ratio between these percentages is calculated and all fragments with a ratio higher than 1.0 were extracted and further analyzed.
